venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
A powerful energy system surrounds and permeates your body, affecting every aspect of your physical, mental and emotional self. These subtle energies are called chakras.

 

This class is devoted to balancing and unifying all the chakras in, above and below your body. You can learn to open more fully to healing, harmonizing life-force energy and to connect with the joy and peace that radiates from within your inner self.


Tonight, you will experience two different guided meditations and you will measure changes in your body's aura before and after each exercise.

Facilitated by Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist.


Bring a pillow, blanket and mat.


Tuition : $25.00

 

Event held at:

The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

190 Old Derby Street, Ste 100

Hingham, MA


Preregistration required. For contact info, visit: http://www.hypnosis.ws

- or - http://www.localendar.com/public/km

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Invocation to the Unified Chakra - hypnosis seminar
